00020 #include <rdkcore/logging/logging.h>
00021 #define LOGGING_MODULE "RImageDiffPoints"

00023 #include "rimagediffpoints.h"

00025 namespace RDK2 { namespace RGraphics {
00026 
00027 RDK2_FACTORY(RImageDiffPoints);
00028 
00029 RImageDiffPoints::RImageDiffPoints(RImage* image, vector<Point2i> points) :
00030     ObjectDiff("RImage"),
00031     refImageWidth(image->getWidth()), refImageHeight(image->getHeight()), refImageType(image->getType())
00032 {
00033     this->points = points;
00034     if (image->getType() == RImage::C8) {
00035         for (size_t i = 0; i < points.size(); i++) {
00036             //colorsC8.push_back(image->getPixels()[points[i].y][points[i].x]);
00037             colorsC8.push_back(image->getBuffer()[points[i].y * image->getWidth() + points[i].x]);
00038         }
00039     }
00040     else {
00041         RDK_ERROR_PRINTF("Other kind of points not yet implemented");
00042     }
00043 }
00044 
00045 RDK2::Object* RImageDiffPoints::clone() const
00046 {
00047     return new RImageDiffPoints(*this);
00048 }
